column4: I'm currently in 8.04, and I just installed 9.04 on a brand new drive. However, I cannot seem to get internet in the 9.04 boot, while I can in this 8.04 boot, help?
lspci says: 05:04.0 Network controller: Texas Instruments ACX 100 22Mbps Wireless Interface
dr_willis_: Kalmi_: what's the standard now? its a really old card, the computer came with a usb wireless device, but I had to use ndiswrapper a while ago and it was a mess, then it kept freezing
no idea.. I rarely mess with wireless any more. :) either it works great.. or it dont.. and i use the wires i got ran all over the house. :)
